page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF MELBOURNE
page.content: MELBOURNE IS A SMALL TOWN WITH A POPULATION OF ABOUT 4000 PEOPLE.IT IS A RURAL AREA FAMOUS FOR MARKET GARDENING. THE POPULATION IS MADE UP OF LONG ESTABLISHED LOCAL FAMILIES AND NEWCOMERS.MANY OF THE LATTER GROUP ARE COMMUTERS TO DERBY,NOTTINGHAM AND BURTON ON TRENT. THE TOWN'S MAIN INDUSTRIES ARE MARKET GARDENING,FARMING,THE TRADITIONAL BOOT AND SHOE INDUSTRY,LIGHT INDUSTRY,ONE HEAVY ENGINEERING FACTORY AND TOURISM. THERE IS A FAMOUS LINK BETWEEN THE TOWN AND MELBOURNE,AUSTRALIA, BECAUSE OF QUEEN VICTORIA'S PRIME MINISTER, LORD MELBOURNE.MELBOURNE,AUSTRALIA, WAS NAMED AFTER HIM BECAUSE OF HIS SERVICES TO THE QUEEN. HE ALSO OWNED MELBOURNE HALL,NOW THE HOME OF LORD AND LADY LOTHIAN.
